SATIS_NAME.description: The name of your Satis composer repository.

SATIS_URL.description: URL to your Satis instance. Usually https://[appname].herokuapp.com.

SATIS_AUTH_USERNAME.description: Username that is required to access your Satis repository. Leave empty to disable authentication.

SATIS_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: Password that is required to access your Satis repository. Can be changed later via Heroku configuration if necessary.

SATIS_SSH_KEY.description: Private SSH key that is used to access repositories.

SATIS_REPOSITORY_EXAMPLE.description: Example repository. Add additional repositories via SATIS_REPOSITORY_* config values.
